snippet: The Solar Energy Industries Association reported that the market for solar energy in the United States boomed in 2012, with new installations increasing by 76 percent.
abstract: Solar Energy Industries Association reports the market for solar energy in the United States boomed in 2012, with new installations increasing by 76 percent from 2011; US market share rises above 10 percent, up from 5 to 7 percent in last seven years.
lead_paragraph: The Solar Energy Industries Association reported that the market for solar energy in the United States boomed in 2012, with new installations increasing by 76 percent.

headline.seo: Solar Group Reports Surge in U.S. Installations
headline.main: Solar Trade Group Reports Surge in U.S. Installations
headline.print_headline: Solar Trade Group Reports Surge in U.S. Installations
